sources.title: Night Of The Sharks
sources.description: A man is killed by gangsters looking for their evidence against them for their criminal activities. Now his brother is in a fight for his life too.

metadata.Plot: David must fight for his life against the gangsters who killed his brother for a CD filled with proof of their illegal activities. When David gets possession of the CD they go down to Mexico where David lives as a shark hunter. Who will get David first, the gangsters or the shark?
metadata.Actors: Treat Williams, Janet Agren, Antonio Fargas
